alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 7:37PM CDT until May 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Western Logan County in central Oklahoma... West central Payne County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cashion, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crescent, Cashion, Covington, Cedar Valley, Marshall, Mulhall, Cimarron City, Orlando, Douglas, Lovell, Lucien, and Hayward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
